channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Potential tree danger to road and pavement, 6th January
item.description:
The tree is on the property of Annisfail however we understand the property is currently empty as the owner has gone into a care home. The tree is very close to the edge of the property and the buses and lorries appear to be scraping the lower branches and taking some off. We are concerned that should the tree fail it could pose a threat as it is so close to the road and pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous pot holes and whole road is a disgrace, 6th January
item.description:
Loads of potholes Road is disintegrating everywhere Sierds of the road all the way down both sides are falling apart Dangerous for walkers and cyclists and dangerous even for motorists as cars are swrvig around nerous problems whole road needs eseurfacing PROPERLY
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Road West, Golden Valley, Cheltenham
